title: Nadhi Pogum Koozhangal Song Lyrics Pisasu
stanzas:
Pogum paathai thooramillai
vaazvhum vazhkai baaramillai
saaindhu tholkodu
iraivanthan undhan kaaladiyil
irul vilagum aga oliyil
annam pagirndhidu
annam pagirndhidu

nadhi pogum koozhaangal
payanam thadaiyum illai
vali thaangum sumai thaangi
mannil baaramillai

ovvoru alaiyin pin
innoru kadal undu
nam kanneer inikkattume

arulin ootrai
kan thiranthavar yaar
iraivan uyir endraare

perum kai aasiyilum
irukai oasaiyilum
puvi enngum punnagai
pookkatume

seo.title: Nadhi Pogum Koozhangal Song Lyrics Pisasu
seo.description: Get the complete Nadhi Pogum Koozhangal Song Lyrics Pisasu from Pisasu. composed by KrishnaKumar(K) and sung by Uthara. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Pisasu, KrishnaKumar(K), Uthara, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
